/usr/bin/c++  -fPIC -O2 -g  -pthread   -shared -Wl,-soname,libgridmap_2d.so -o ../lib/libgridmap_2d.so CMakeFiles/gridmap_2d.dir/src/GridMap2D.o -L/opt/ros/fuerte/lib -lopencv_calib3d -lopencv_contrib -lopencv_core -lopencv_features2d -lopencv_flann -lopencv_gpu -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_imgproc -lopencv_legacy -lopencv_ml -lopencv_nonfree -lopencv_objdetect -lopencv_photo -lopencv_stitching -lopencv_ts -lopencv_video -lopencv_videostab -Wl,-rpath,/opt/ros/fuerte/lib
